title: Stockholm Diaries, Caroline
description: 2016 National Excellence in Romance Fiction Award Winner - Contemporary SeriesThe Plan:A month in Sweden to jump-start her photojournalism careerNot in the Plan:The hot hockey player who lives across the hallBut an adventure abroad never goes according to plan...right? Especially when the not-in-the-plan guy has a bad reputation.Time is running out. Caroline must choose what is safe or choose what her heart tells her is right.But what if her heart wants more than one thing?2015 Chatelaine Awards for Romantic Fiction Finalist - Contemporary Romance"...beautiful debut novel..." - InD'tale Magazine, Feb 2016This is a stand-alone romance novel at 65,000 words with a HFN. Stockholm Diaries, Caroline 2 is the next episode in their adventure.
author: Rebecca  Hunter
